arts.ttl: Silva rues ‘missed opportunity’ after Fulham’s derby defeat
arts.sum: Marco Silva admitted it was a “missed opportunity” after his Fulham side suffered a dramatic 2-1 west London derby defeat against Chelsea. The Whites went ahead in the 20th minute at Craven Cottage through Alex Iwobi. But they faded in the second half and Chelsea substitute Tyrique George equalised before a stunning strike from Pedro […] The post Silva rues ‘missed opportunity’ after Fulham’s derby defeat appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Pedro Neto late strike clinches comeback win for Chelsea at Fulham
arts.sum: Substitute Tyrique George equalised seven minutes from time after Alex Iwobi had given Fulham a 20th-minute lead.

arts.ttl: Chelsea player ratings vs Fulham as Neto redeems himself, George impact
arts.sum: Chelsea's Champions League hopes remain alive with Pedro Neto scoring a stoppage time winner to complete a late turnaround against Fulham. Neto scored a stunning goal in stoppage time to keep Chelsea's Champions League dream alive - moving the Blues up to fifth-place in the table.

arts.ttl: Fulham vs. Chelsea team news: Has Enzo Maresca reacted to Legia Warsaw defeat?
arts.sum: Fulham and Chelsea announce their starting lineups for Sunday's West London derby at Craven Cottage.

arts.ttl: Fulham vs Chelsea: Preview, predictions and lineups
